name: 5th International Conference on Advanced Research in Teaching and Education
content: The 2022 education conferences’ organizing committee would like to invite you to the 5th International Conference on Advanced Research in Teaching and Education to be held on April 08-10, 2022 in the historic city of Paris, France. The ICATE international conference on education seeks to facilitate energetic discussions and exchange of ideas, and bridge the existing gaps in the various disciplines in the field of education studies including education, teaching, learning, assessment, inclusive education, online learning, emerging education technologies, and many more. It actively engages early career teachers, junior scholars, established academics, research fellows and leading members from the field of education in various sessions of the conference. We look forward to extending a warm welcome to you at international education conferences 2022 in Paris, Centre International de Conférences Sorbonne Universités (CICSU).
